message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to acquire this valuable product. Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $1,350,000 feels fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer. However, I believe the value of this product is significantly higher than your proposed price. I'm willing to come down to $1,275,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're willing to come down, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,225,000. This is my final offer.
